    The Smurfs

    less than 1 minute read

    The Smurfs

    今天刚知道的

    蓝精灵叫Smurf
    蓝爸爸叫Papa Smurf
    蓝妹妹叫Smurfette
    格格巫叫Wicked Gargamel
    阿兹猫叫Azrael
    聪聪，笨笨，厌厌这些叫Brainy，Clumsy，Grouchy、etc

    中文翻译的真好，看到英语这些形容词一点都没有Q的感觉

    个人觉得翻译的最好的还是变形金刚
    Optimus Prime叫擎天柱
    Megatron叫威震天
    都是特魄力的名字

    记得后来还有惊破天什么的，小时候觉得剧情太复杂就看不懂了

    汽车人，变形～～～～  



    ps 回答一下awu的问题，hoho
    http://www.naughtykitty.org/barbapapa/barbameet.html
    • 爸爸和妈妈
    • Barbapapa, pink, male, lover of Barbamama
    • Barbamama, balck, female, lover of Barbapapa
    • 下面是那些娃娃
    • Barbazoo, yellow, male, lover of animals
    • Barbalala, green, female, lover of music
    • Barbalib, orange, female, lover of books
    • Barbabeau, black and furry, male, lover of art
    • Barbabelle, purple, female, lover of beauty
    • Barbabright, blue, male, lover of science
    • Barbabravo, red, male, lover of strength and heroism
    我以前会背那个顺口遛的，现在忘了。。。哀哀。。。

    ps 2 再八卦一下，讲巴巴爸爸原创者， Annette Tison & Talus Taylor  的故事。

    The couple met at a Paris cafe and a writing relationship ensued, from which Barbapapa was born. Soon after, they were married.   The couple reside in Paris where they remain happily married to this day.

    kao, 浪漫的一塌糊涂。。。
